```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{css, echo=FALSE}
/* 1. Prepare the container to handle absolute positioning */
div.csl-entry {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1; /* Ensures the text stays on top of the highlight */
}

/* 2. Create the Highlight using a Pseudo-Element */
/* instead of modifying the element itself */
div.csl-entry:target::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  
  /* Sizing the box */
  top: -3px;
  bottom: -3px;
  right: -5px;
  /* This extends the yellow box to the left to cover the hanging indent */
  /* -2em is usually safe for standard bibliographies (which use 1.5em indent) */
  left: -2em; 
  
  /* Styling */
  background-color: #ffeb3b;
  border-radius: 4px;
  outline: 1px solid #fbc02d;
  
  /* Layering: Put it BEHIND the text */
  z-index: -1; 
}
div:target > h1,
div:target > h2,
div:target > h3,
div:target > h4,
div:target > h5,
div:target > h6,
section:target > h1,
section:target > h2,
section:target > h3 {
  background-color: #ffeb3b;
  transition: background-color 0.8s ease;
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 2px 8px;
  border-radius: 4px;
}
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
```
## Figure 2: Feasibility Profile
The feasibility profile shows the consistency of the experimental data with different chain lengths $n$. 

```{r fig2, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

# Loading data from your Java terminal run
df <- read.table("output/Feasibility.res", header = TRUE)

ggplot(df, aes(x = n, y = infeasibility)) +
  geom_line(color = "steelblue", linewidth = 1) +
  geom_point(color = "darkblue", size = 2) +
  scale_y_log10() + 
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Figure 2: Feasibility Profile",
    subtitle = "Infeasibility drops significantly at n=13",
    x = "Chain Length (n)",
    y = "Infeasibility (Log Scale)"
  )

```
